org.apache.hadoop.fs

Class Options.OpenFileOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.Options.OpenFileOptions
  • Enclosing class:
    Options

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public static final class Options.OpenFileOptions
extends Object
    The standard openFile() options.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE
      Prefix for all openFile options: "fs.option.openfile.".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_BUFFER_SIZE
      OpenFile option for buffer size: "fs.option.openfile.buffer.size".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_EC_POLICY
      EC policy to be set on the file that needs to be created : "fs.option.openfile.ec.policy".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_FOOTER_CACHE
      OpenFile footer cache flag: "fs.option.openfile.footer.cache".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_LENGTH
      OpenFile option for file length: "fs.option.openfile.length".
      static Set<String> FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICIES
      All the current read policies as a set.
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY
      OpenFile option for read policies: "fs.option.openfile.read.policy".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_ADAPTIVE
      Read policy for adaptive IO: "adaptive".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_AVRO
      We are an avro file: "avro".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_COLUMNAR
      This is a columnar file format.
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_CSV
      This is a CSV file of plain or UTF-8 text to be read sequentially.
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_DEFAULT
      Read policy "default" -whatever the implementation does by default.
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_HBASE
      This is a table file for Apache HBase.
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_JSON
      This is a JSON file of UTF-8 text, including a JSON line file where each line is a JSON entity.
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_ORC
      This is an ORC file.
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_PARQUET
      This is a parquet file with a v1/v3 footer: "parquet".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_RANDOM
      Read policy for random IO: "random".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_SEQUENTIAL
      Read policy for sequential IO: "sequential".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_VECTOR
      Vectored IO API to be used: "vector".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_READ_POLICY_WHOLE_FILE
      Whole file to be read, end-to-end: "whole-file".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_SPLIT_END
      OpenFile option for split end: "fs.option.openfile.split.end".
      static String FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_SPLIT_START
      OpenFile option for split start: "fs.option.openfile.split.start".
      static Set<String> FS_OPTION_OPENFILE_STANDARD_OPTIONS
      Set of standard options which openFile implementations MUST recognize, even if they ignore the actual values.
